Class InternshipOpportunity

java.lang.Object
internship_management_system.internships.InternshipOpportunity

  • Constructor Details

    • InternshipOpportunity

      public InternshipOpportunity(int id, String title, String description, String preferredMajor, InternshipLevel level, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, CompanyRepresentative companyRep, int numOfSlots, boolean visibility)
      Constructor for InternshipOpportunity
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the internship opportunity, also the index in the DataStorage list
      title - The title of the internship opportunity
      description - The description of the internship opportunity
      preferredMajor - The preferred major for the internship opportunity
      level - The level of the internship opportunity
      openingDate - The opening date of the internship opportunity
      closingDate - The closing date of the internship opportunity
      companyRep - The company representative associated with the internship opportunity
      numOfSlots - The number of slots available for the internship opportunity
      visibility - The visibility status of the internship opportunity
